For the stir-fried beef: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: To make the crispy noodle cake, stir the soy sauce and sesame oil into the cooked noodles. Heat the vegetable oil in a small frying pan, add the noodles and cook for three minutes on each side. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper.

To make the stir-fried beef, heat the vegetable oil in a frying pan, add the spring onion and cook for two minutes. Add the garlic, chilli and ginger and cook for one minute. Add the beef and stir fry for 1-2 minutes. Stir in the sugar snap peas.
To serve, pour the stir-fried beef onto the crispy noodle cake.
title: Crispy noodle cake with stir-fried beef
